snippet.title: How Effective Are Medical Treatments For Back Pain?
snippet.description: * How Effective Are Medical Treatments For Back Pain? snippet.title: Cigarette Brand Preferences: start young and focus on 3 brands.

snippet.title: Study finds smokers prefer Snus and Zonnic over Nicotine Gum
snippet.description: * Study finds smokers prefer Snus and Zonnic over Nicotine Gum A study was just published comparing the effects of nicotine gum, snus (smokeless tobacco sachets) and Zonnic (new synthetic nicotine replacement sachets) for reducing smoking. The study by Drs Caldwell, Burgess and Crane was conducted with 63 cigare...
